name: azure-blob-connector
description: Azure Blob Storage integration with containers, blobs, and SAS tokens
author: Hermetic Labs

media.caption: Azure Blob Storage Connector hero image

card.title: Azure Blob Storage
card.description: Azure Blob integration with containers, SAS tokens, and access tiers

summary.overview: Full Azure Blob Storage integration supporting container management, blob operations, SAS token generation for secure access, and hot/cool/archive tier management.
summary.exampleUseCase: Store large media files in cool storage for cost savings, generate SAS tokens with expiration for temporary partner access, and automatically move old data to archive tier.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Direct Azure connectivity without intermediaries. Supports lease handling for concurrent access control and integrates with EVE's unified storage layer alongside S3 and GCS.
